segments.text: Where are you going for your trip ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think Hebes is a good place .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I heard the north of China are experiencing severe sandstorms !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it's said that Hebes was experiencing six degree strong winds .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do these storms affect the people who live in these areas ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The report said the number of people with respiratory tract infections tended to rise after sandstorms . The sand gets into people's noses and throats and creates irritation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It sounds that sandstorms are trouble for everybody !
segments.speaker: S2
